document.topic_text: SOLUTION: x+y +(x^2+xy+y^2)+(x^3+x^2y+xy^2+y^3)+...to infinite terms Algebra -> Sequences-and-series -> SOLUTION: x+y +(x^2+xy+y^2)+(x^3+x^2y+xy^2+y^3)+...to infinite terms
